attributes.action: Reduce the grade boundaries for A Level Exams 2023
attributes.additional_details:
Current A-Level students haven't sat through GCSE-no prior experience of sitting through an exam.

Effects of Covid-19 still plague many students and teacher across the country. Many students were without their subject teacher(s) for a term or more due to catching covid. Many students could not attend school for the same reason.

Teachers strikes left many students without adequate support for several days.

Bus/Rail strikes - many people without a transport to school for several days of terms.
attributes.background: Work with all the exam boards in the UK and reduce the grade boundaries for A Level Exams 2023.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631743
